title: Beautiful apartment for Rent
posting_body: Come and see this magnificent 1910 Colonial style home apartment in a 2 family home in a highly sought after Belvidere section of Lowell.
Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms, ample closet space, large living room and dining, hardwood floors.
This beautiful 1st floor unit is in exceptional condition, ready for you to move in.
We are waiting for the Lead Certificate.
Move in costs: First month rent ($2600) 1/2 month security deposit ($1300) last months ($2600)
Brokers fee($2600)Application, recent paystubs, credit report, references including 1 month deposit to Pena Realty Corp before showing apartment.
Please schedule for an in person tour for current condition before renting.
